title: parishuddham
sahitya:
parishuddham AkkuvAi dEvi en vAzhvinai dEvi  en vAzhvinai


anupallavi

  aruLum anbum arivum niraivum tiruvum perugak-karuNai taruvAi
iruLum iDiyum inrODozhiya sharaNAgatiyE dharaNikkE


caraNam 1    kAma krOdhamAm karuttinil azhukkinai gangai pOnra aruL perukkinAl 
kazhuvi Amai pOnraiyAyanaittaiyum aDakki AtmAnandattait-taruvAi dEvi
    caraNam 2    peNgaLellAm en tyAgap-pon piNi aNUgAdadu vEhAga
kaNgaLellAm un karuNai yAgattil karuttinirk-ellAm unnoLiyAga
    caraNam 3    karma phalangaLellAm arppaNam dEvi karaNamum kAyamum kAnamum arppaNam
janmamum jIvanum cintaiyum arppaNam shEi nAn un pada tAyE arppaNam
